TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DefaultHttpHandler extends System.Object implements class System.Web.IHttpAsyncHandler, class System.Web.IHttpHandler
type DefaultHttpHandler = class interface IHttpAsyncHandler interface IHttpHandler

summary.span: 表示默认 HTTP 处理程序的属性和方法。

span.span: Represents the properties and methods of a default HTTP handler.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一个对象截获 HTTP 管道中的传入请求时都请求拦截已配置通过 Internet 信息服务 (IIS) 6.0，并且没有显式绑定应用于请求的扩展。A object intercepts incoming requests in the HTTP pipeline when both request interception has been configured through Internet Information Services (IIS) 6.0 and no explicit bindings apply to the requested extension. 可以通过在 IIS 6.0 中引入的通配符应用程序映射功能设置请求拦截。Request interception can be set up through the wildcard application mapping feature introduced in IIS 6.0. 有关详细信息，搜索[MSDN 库](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37118)有关使用通配符应用程序映射来将 URL 重新映射信息。For more information, search the [MSDN Library](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37118) for information about using wildcard application maps to remap a URL. 类实现接口，以提供异步请求处理。The class implements the interface to provide asynchronous request processing. 有关 HTTP 处理程序的常规信息，请参阅[HTTP 处理程序和 HTTP 模块概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f540bdeb-d22e-4e1d-ba8a-fe6c9926283b)。For general information about HTTP handlers, see [HTTP Handlers and HTTP Modules Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f540bdeb-d22e-4e1d-ba8a-fe6c9926283b). 此外，有关详细信息，请参阅以下：Additionally, for more information see the following: - 有关创建异步 HTTP 处理程序，请参阅[演练： 创建异步 HTTP 处理程序](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1b5c4a27-599b-44d0-8a06-72edc6765aa9)。About creating asynchronous HTTP handlers, see [Walkthrough: Creating an Asynchronous HTTP Handler](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1b5c4a27-599b-44d0-8a06-72edc6765aa9). - 有关注册 HTTP 处理程序，请参阅[如何： 注册 HTTP 处理程序](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d5633f9a-03fb-4ccc-a799-dc67d656fa60)。About registering HTTP handlers, see [How to: Register HTTP Handlers](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d5633f9a-03fb-4ccc-a799-dc67d656fa60). 类可以派生类以提供自定义的处理的请求。Classes can derive from the class to provide customized handling of requests. 异步 HTTP 处理程序派生自可以重写方法，以更改请求的处理方式。An asynchronous HTTP handler that is derived from the could override the method to change how requests are processed. 一个不使用 ASP.NET 错误。A does not use ASP.NET errors. 现有内容，它使用 IIS 错误或适当 ISAPI 自定义错误机制将工作不变。Existing content that uses IIS errors or a propriety ISAPI custom error mechanism would work unchanged. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何通过派生自实现自定义的 HTTP 处理程序类。The following code example demonstrates how to implement a customized HTTP handler by deriving from the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.DefaultHttpHandler#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.DefaultHttpHandler/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.DefaultHttpHandler#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.DefaultHttpHandler/VB/source.vb#1)]

returns.span: 包含有关进程状态信息的 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在创建用于异步 HTTP 处理程序时，您的处理程序必须实现异步和asp.net 以异步方式调用的方法。When creating an HTTP handler for asynchronous use, your handler must implement the asynchronous and methods that are called asynchronously by ASP.NET.

exception.span: 处理请求的前提条件未满足，被请求的文件具有 .asp 后缀或请求是通过 POST 发送的。

span.span: The preconditions for processing a request fail and either the requested file has the suffix .asp or the request was sent through POST.

summary.span: 获取要随请求一起传输的请求标头和请求值的集合。

span.span: Gets a collection of request headers and request values to transfer along with the request.
A containing request headers and values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性返回一个空集合，除非在派生类中填充类。The property returns an empty collection unless it is populated in a class that is derived from the class. 添加的标头追加到然后再将请求传递到 Internet 信息服务 (IIS) 中的返回在请求中的标头的集合。The headers that are added are appended to the collection of headers in the request before passing the request back to Internet Information Services (IIS).

summary.span: 在前提条件阻止 对象处理请求时被调用。

span.span: Called when preconditions prevent the object from processing a request.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 前置条件指定的请求标头字段中的客户端和 Web 服务器上计算。Preconditions are specified by the client in the request-header fields and are evaluated on the Web server. 例如，通过使用前置条件，客户端可以防止 （例如 GET） 请求的方法应用于之外的资源。For example, by using preconditions, clients can prevent a requested method (for example, GET) from being applied to a resource other than the one intended. 详细信息，请参阅第 14，"标头字段定义"节中[超文本传输协议-HTTP/1.1](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=73147) World Wide Web 联合会 (W3C) 网站上的规范。For more information, see section 14, "Header Field Definitions," in the [Hypertext Transfer Protocol -- HTTP/1.1](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=73147) specification on the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) Web site. 前提条件阻止时，调用方法处理请求的对象。The method is called when preconditions prevent the object from processing a request. 派生类可能会替代方法前置条件失败时引发异常。A deriving class might override the method to throw an exception when the preconditions fail. 不会引发异常方法。The does not throw an exception in the method. 以下任何操作都会导致前置条件失败：Any of the following will cause the preconditions to fail: - 调用 。Calling . - 调用 。Calling . - 调用 。Calling . - 更改响应的缓存策略。Changing the cache policy for the response. - 添加对象作为一个筛选器，属性。Adding a object as a filter to the property.

summary.span: 重写当前请求的目标 URL。

span.span: Overrides the target URL for the current request.

returns.span: 要在请求中使用的被重写的 URL；如果未提供被重写的 URL，则为 。

span.span: The overridden URL to use in the request; or if an overridden URL is not provided.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将返回`null`除非在派生自的类中重写类。The method returns `null` unless it is overridden in a class that is derived from the class. 只有如果 ASP.NET 工作进程隔离模式在运行在 IIS 6.0 和响应不是修改之前调用方法调用对象。The method is called only if ASP.NET is running in worker process isolation mode on IIS 6.0, and if the response was not modified before the object was called. 通过以下任一操作都会修改响应：The response is modified by any of the following: - 调用 。Calling . - 调用 。Calling . - 调用 。Calling . - 更改响应的缓存策略。Changing the cache policy for the response. - 添加对象作为一个筛选器，属性。Adding a object as a filter to the property.

summary.span: 使 对象能够处理 HTTP Web 请求。

span.span: Enables a object to process of HTTP Web requests.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不应以同步方式调用方法。The method should not be called synchronously. 类派生自类可以重写以提供自定义的请求处理。Classes that are derived from the class can override the to provide customized request processing.

span.span: The is called synchronously.
